name: Diss Room - the not very good tribute version
name_original: Diss Room - the not very good tribute version
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Disc Room Game Jam tribute that is unfinished

Wanted to try and recreate the intro and start of Disc Room so that I could use it as a learning experience of how to make something actually fun for someone to play. Something I feel I haven't really been able to do with my own little games.

Found out about the jam late and also have a little 1 year old running around these days so didn't get much time to work on this so it's unfinished and broken but hopefully I'll get some more time to work on it later as it's been a fun experiment.
